title: The New traders
creator_credit: Unilever Films, United Africa Company, Gerard Holdsworth and Sydney Latter
brief_description: In town and village modern merchandising is changing the habits, customs and outlook of the peoples of Nigeria and Ghana. The African retailer is adapting his old trading skills learned in the traditional market stalls, and applying up-to-date techniques. Shows something of the way in which the United Africa Company is contributing to the part these new traders are now playing.
